title: Ubetsports01
author: Ubetsports01
content: Web3 Sports Betting Research - Get $10USDC for 30 min betting interview! My name is Rushi, and I am the Head of Product and Marketing Lead in UBET Sports. I am conducting a research study to understand the motivations for betting, decision-making processes, and pain points of crypto sports bettors. The purpose of this study is to validate market assumptions and gather valuable insights.✔️ Sessions will be conducted in English via Zoom or Google Meet (video must be turned on). ✔️ Participation in this session is voluntary and anonymous; no personal information will be captured during the session. ✔️ You will be compensated for your time with a $10USDC in Polygon. To be eligible for this research interview, here are the following requirements:✅ You must be an active sports bettor within the last 6 months.✅ Share your betting platform experiences  ✅ You must be cricket, tennis, cs:go, valorant, baseball bettors✅ You must already know what a USDC polygon is (otherwise it’s hard to payout)✅ You must have a crypto wallet. If you meet the above requirements and are interested in participating, please send an email to rushi.yogar@sportsinference.com. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or concerns regarding the study.I look forward to speaking with you soon.Sincerely, Rushi

comments.body: Quote from: Ubetsports01 on May 24, 2023, 03:26:53 PMI look forward to speaking with you soon.Helloo Rushi!I don't think for this type of serious job you will be able to get people from this section. In the service board you may find some guys who will take the job seriously and would not mind to share their experience. But to do that, you need:1. Offer payment in BTC2. Reward seems very low, try to increase it however but I am sure there are people who will not mind the $10.Good luck on your research job.

comments.author: Ubetsports01
comments.body: Quote from: Ubetsports01 on May 24, 2023, 03:26:53 PMWeb3 Sports Betting Research - Get $10USDC for 30 min betting interview! My name is Rushi, and I am the Head of Product and Marketing Lead in UBET Sports. I am conducting a research study to understand the motivations for betting, decision-making processes, and pain points of crypto sports bettors. The purpose of this study is to validate market assumptions and gather valuable insights.✔️ Sessions will be conducted in English via Zoom or Google Meet (video must be turned on). ✔️ Participation in this session is voluntary and anonymous; no personal information will be captured during the session. ✔️ You will be compensated for your time with a $10USDC in Polygon. To be eligible for this research interview, here are the following requirements:✅ You must be an active sports bettor within the last 6 months.✅ Share your betting platform experiences  ✅ You must be cricket, tennis, cs:go, valorant, baseball bettors✅ You must already know what a USDC polygon is (otherwise it’s hard to payout)✅ You must have a crypto wallet. If you meet the above requirements and are interested in participating, please send an email to rushi.yogar@sportsinference.com. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or concerns regarding the study.I look forward to speaking with you soon.Sincerely, RushiUpdate #2As an early-stage startup company, I'm unable to allocate a significant budget for my research. However, I have made some adjustments to the interview process, and I present you with two options:Option 1:If you are a genuine sports gambler who is willing to assist us in our research but prefers not to appear on a video call, please feel free to connect with us using the contact details provided below. I would love to hear about your experiences.WhatsApp: +1 4379005526Telegram: @rush00907Discord: Rush#4970Meeting link: https://calendly.com/rushi-yogarOption 2:If you do not mind showing your face on a video call and are willing to provide proof of a Crypto Betting Transaction ID (to ensure your authenticity as a genuine bettor and protect my research from scammers), I'm offering a compensation of 20 USDC. Kindly fill out the form at the following link to schedule a meeting: https://forms.gle/RfxhDj9MSnJFWTHX9
